title: Senior Infrastructure Engineer (m/f/d)
body:
About Hays

IT specialists hold all the cards: for its customers in industry and the public sector, Hays is looking for motivated employees who like looking at the bigger picture and growing with new challenges.

We make sure that you benefit from our many years of experience in IT recruitment and will find you the right role to suit your skills and interests - all completely free of charge to you. Register with us and reap the benefits of job offers that are both interesting and relevant to your skills and experience.

My duties

  • Internal consulting, design and implementation of the IT platform solution
  • Interface role during implementation and support phase
  • Supporting standardisation and deployment automatisation of the solutions
  • Continuous evaluation of identified possible improvements for standard solutions
  • Collaboration with other delivery project engineers during IT delivery phase (remote and onsite)
  • Integration of IT solutions in new and or existing environments
  • Designing, planning and technically executing changes and extensions to existing systems (change requests)
  • Internal and external training's related to the areas of expertise
  • Compilation of test procedures in cooperation with project delivery engineer
  • Execution of system tests, fault investigation and documentation during system integration phase
  • Documentation for internal and external customers
  • Performing system audits

My qualifications

  • Profound Experience in realising IT platform solutions, define requirements and release new software
  • Administration competence in OS (Windows Server 2012 and newer/ Clients Windows 7 and newer) including Active Directory, Network (CISCO configuration,Security: Barracuda, Brocade, Genua)
  • Administration competence Monitoring (ZABBIX) Virtualisation (VMWare, ESXi, optionally HyperV), VoIP
  • Very good German and English skills
  • Knowledge of the following areas are an advantage: Linux (Red Hat), Docker, Databases (MS SQL, Oracle) , Storage (NetApp, QNAP) as well as automatisation and deployment systems (Ansible) and Cloud solutions (Azure)

My benefits

  • A highly motivated team and an open way of communication
  • Fascinating, innovative environment in an international atmosphere
